Rules and recommendations

General information about cycling: Please be aware that free movement restrictions are in place currently. You can ride your bike in the allowed time (5 AM - 8.59 PM). Cycling out of the given time is permitted only in these cases: transport to and from work, the exercise of the profession and urgent travel to protect life, health and property.

There is no duty to wear a face mask or face covering during sport. Nevertheless, you should consider wearing it on the bike as well. During the ride, it is necessary to keep a two-meters distance from others, and you should avoid mass cycling. If you are bypassing someone, try to maintain as much spacing as possible. But most of all, be careful not to harm yourself while riding - now is not the best time to be hospitalized.

questions_answers.question: Do I need to have a face mask while cycling?
questions_answers.value: No, wearing face mask is not mandatory, but you should consider wearing one.

questions_answers.question: I am using my bike in work to deliver food. Can I use it even after curfew?
questions_answers.value: Yes, there is an exception for food delivery.
